item.title: Build A Blog Website
item.description: Building A Blog Websiteüåè Based on Hugo the hugo-PaperMod theme. Site demo: Installing hugo Follow Hugo Docs’s - Quick Start guide to install Hugo. macOS brew install hugo Windows scoop install hugo-extended Git must be installed as well. Creating a site Execute the following command in the terminal. It will create the directory structure for your project in the blogwebsite directory. hugo new site blogwebsite --format yaml Installing PaperMod Theme Themes reside in blogwebsite/themes directory.
